body:
Hi!


>     Hi all,
>
>     I was wondering whether anyone recently made Brad work using any
>     kind of Linux?
>
>
> There is a new project that works with Blender 2.57:
>
> http://www.ods-engineering.com/blendme
>
> Don't know if it's already released yet, though.
>
> Thomas


That looks cool, but they seam not to fully release it as open source, 
which leaves some questionmarks (it is basically a great integration of 
existing open source software into Blender).


Cheers, Lars.
___
